name: I NEED SPACE [DEMO]
description:
I NEED SPACE is a cozy 2D open-space adventure, set during a Celestial Pandemic.

with your nebulous companion the Cosmicat, together revitalizing planets and discovering the cosmic truth of the universe.



Follow our social media and be the first to know about
release dates, sneak peeks, and exclusive offers. 

You can also join us on discord and be an Early Explorer
to participate in playtests, get exclusive stickers, and get to know the community!
